title: Tablas Creek Wine Dinner

banner_image.name: PH_WineDinners_TC_937x400
banner_image.alt: Padre: artwork with monogram letter T and text that reads 12.19.18 Wine Dinner

description:
Sip and savor 4 decadent courses prepared by Chef Chris Sayre and perfectly paired by Tablas Creek Vineyards. This intimate evening of food and vino takes places on October 17th on the Prairie Fire rooftop.

Time: 7pm on 12/19
Price: $110 per person* includes welcome wine, hor d'oeuvres and 4 paired courses
*21+ only, seating is limited, gratuity not included in ticket price
short_description: Sip and savor 4 decadent courses prepared by Chef Chris Sayre and perfectly paired by Tablas Creek Vineyards. This intimate evening of food and vino takes places on October 17th on the Prairie Fire rooftop.
